pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 彼は話を和らげるために若干の冗談を必要とする。
lessons.english: He needs a few jokes to lighten up his talk.

lessons.japanese: 公園のつつじの世話をする庭師が若干名いる。
lessons.english: Several gardeners look after the azaleas in the park.

lessons.japanese: ブッシュ氏の得票数はゴア氏を若干上回った。
lessons.english: Mr. Bush had slightly more votes than Mr. Gore.

lessons.japanese: 今テストしてみたところ、若干動作が鈍いが、正常に動く。
lessons.english: I just did a test and it's a bit slow but working fine.
